item.title: Short Cut for Jyputer notebook
item.description: Recently I am taking a online course in Coursra about data analysis with Python and therefore I started to use Jyputer notebook. In order to separate the text and code, a new crunk is required in Jyputer notebook, like Alt+Ctrl+i in Rmarkdown. Here are some short keys which I found useful. item.title: My first post with Blogdown (Small tips included!)
item.description: Finally, I am starting my blog with blogdown! It takes a long time to establish it than I expected. Some Youtubes are now teaching how to build it within 15 min, which I have used much more than that! However, that is normal for someone like me without much experience with those Hugo, Netlify, and markdowns. To summerise all the steps I took, I would recommend reading the post from Martin Frigaard.
